page.title: 18HORBURY PEOPLE'S FOOD
page.content: JUNK FOOD:Junk food originated in America but is becoming popular in Britain.It is considered unhealthy because of it's high fat and/or sugar content.Junk food includes hamburgers and hot dogs.A hamburger is a round minced meat pattie in a round bun.A hot dog is a meat sausage in a long bread bun.Both the meat pattie and the sausage have cereal added because this is cheaper than meat. SUNDAY LUNCH:Sunday lunch is the main family meal of the week.We have Yorkshire puddings;roast potatoes;new potatoes;peas;carrots;and roast beef or lamb.Sometimes my Mum makes an apple pie,which we have with custard. TAKE-AWAYS:Two of my favourite meals are fish and chips,bought ready cooked from Mick's fish shop in Queen Street and Chinese food,bought from the Lucky Flower take-away in the High Street.
